ygData.subject: Re: Executioner Hood vs BI Crown
ygData.msgSnippet: I managed to get into the Lord group on sunday, after begging I could handle it (I was level 37) and that it was only the day before that I spent the whole day
ygData.messageBody:
I managed to get into the Lord group on sunday, after begging I could
handle it (I was level 37) and that it was only the day before that I spent
the whole day camping the magi. The leader agreed and upon arriving to the
Lord group I realised I knew 3 of the people there very well. All former
guild mates so I knew I was in good hands.

I was already dual wielding Yaks after some fine fortune on friday evening,
I offered my sharkjaw Cutlass for a Yak and the guy accepted. I was so
pleased, no I deal out a modest amount of dmg.

Spent 8 hours at the Lord camp sunday, made 2 bubs exp and hit level 38
(yet another useless song). Only died once and that was because the Lord
was too hard. Wiped all but 2 of us out (they gated out). Another group
watched us die and didn't help, hoping they would get the kill but our
cleric was bound next to the Lord room and managed to get the exp for us.
In total we saw 2 Yaks and 6 SSB's. I lost every single roll <sigh> I never
rolled higher than a 62, what is wrong with me???

Spent 10 hours in magi on saturday and he only spawned twice (no smr). Made
3 bubs here.

Anyway, good weekend for me, I made 5 bubs exp total, and got my second
Yak. I am so pleased.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 38 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server




"Naeeldar" <jackal@...> on 11/02/2000 01:21:38

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Executioner Hood vs BI Crown




From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>

Heh now a days it's by far late 30's early 40s. People used to take 3
groups
there now groups do it with 3 people. Even so it's definitly late 30's
early
40's with a big group in guk.

Naeeldar

>
>Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
>Tyria Sarkin, L39 High Elf Wizard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>> is that by the time I can camp for Ykeshas (late 30s/early

>> benefit of having
>> +5 to all resist rates?
>>
>> Whats a good price if I decide to sell the Exe Hood?
>>
>> Thanks
>> Galtin of E'ci
